products.title: Metz Pvc Blackout Snow White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: The metz pvc blackout patterned range, changes colour shades when light hits it, and offers a wide array of colours to choose from. Waterproof and flame retardant, metz fabrics are durable and practical. Vertical blinds offer optimal light and privacy control, so are a firm favourite in the uk, especially with overlooked houses and office. This bright white, marbled, snow white blackout vertical blind is also great at blocking out light, so is a great option for rooms where screens feature, such as living rooms or offices, and due to it's waterproof fabric, is also a smart option for bathrooms or kitchensat swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new vertical blind is made by their expert team, in their yorkshire workshop, and comes with a free five year guarantee and customer-first aftercare.

products.title: Uniview 3200 Urban Dark Grey/white 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their uniview 3200 vertical blinds are flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics. As a pvc / polyester fabric they're ideal for temperature control in offices and hot roomns. In addition to this, their 'magic screen' blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let people outside see in. They're great for optimal privacy control and come in a stylish set of key neutral colours. Their urban dark grey / white is a bold, modern choice.

Product id: db-vtb1477 fabric colour: calico cream material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes stripe solar calico cream 89mm vertical blind in cream.
